titleStmt.title: Ēh probolē tēs alētheias or The bul-warke of truth, being a treatise of God, of Jesus Christ, of the Holy Ghost, and of the Trinity in unity, against atheists and hereticks. / By Robert Bayfeild.
titleStmt.author: Bayfield, Robert, b. 1629.
Faithorne, William, 1616-1691, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. for Edw. Dod. at the sign of the Gun in Ivy-Lane,

notesStmt.note: First four words of title in Greek characters.
The plate is signed: W. Faithorne sculp:.
With two final advertisement leaves and a final errata leaf; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Gun in Ivy-Lane
